data.title: Forest of the Hanged
data.meta_description: Read the review and get showtimes for this film..
data.text:
Synopsis

The Rumanian front near the Austro-Hungarian border during World War I is the setting for this anti-war film taken from the book by Luivu Rebreanu. After a multinational group witnesses a hanging and other military deceptions, they walk away with a different attitude towards war and the nations who are continuing the fighting.~ Dan Pavlides, All Movie Guide
